description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              ** JOB SUMMARY
              
              GES will be setting up an ODC (Offshore Development Center) for a Japanese Automotive supplier. The ODC will initially focus on software testing - including unit test, coverage, static analysis etc. All the requirements would be specific to Automotive.
              

              ** SCOPE OF RESPONSIBILITY
              
              The tasks that the team will handle are to analyze the code using some tools and to design test cases to test the code. They will follow a process set by the customer and will be using test tools specified by the customer.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              ** MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
              
              1. Education
              
              - University/ College: Engineering Graduate
              
              - Major: Computer Science or Electronics
              

              2. Experience
              
              1-2 years of experience in testing/development related to embedded systems. Coverage testing experience is preferred. Should be capable of understanding C code easily, selecting test data based on the equivalence partition of the code to test and calculating the expected results of variables at the partition based on the test data used.
              

              ** EQUIPMENT USED
              
              Computer & software applications: WinAMS etc; Programming language – C
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Competitive salary and bonus
               







                Professional and active working environment
               







                Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance according to Labor Laws
